overview: Marina and Andriy are an adult couple and have been trying to have a child for a long time. Their relationship has become cold, closed, and sex is becoming a technical process on a schedule between getting medications. Despite the conscientious implementation of all doctors appointments, Marina has spontaneous abortion. The main question between Marina and Andriy is whether they will be able to have a child at all and whether they need each other, looking at what their relationship has become.
title: WE
